remarks: The value of the identity element of a group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gidval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gidval $p |- ( G e. V -> ( GId ` G ) = ( iota_ u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u G x ) = x /\ ( x G u ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d X u x $.
